remarks: The domain of a map-to function with a limit.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
limcmptdm.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
limcmptdm.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
limcmptdm.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( F limCC D ) ) $.
limcmptdm $p |- ( ph -> A C_ CC ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
